Posted By: mutantman (1/29/2010 3:23:39 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I don't know if I like it. You're going to need a big creature in your graveyard before it's effective. Unearth might use it, but chances are unless the above mentioned "must sac at end of turn" creatures are involved, I don't see why you'd waste a space for it. Could have been amazing for a couple more mana and you pull from your library, and not your graveyard.
